name: Zoomerz
description:
How far can you get in this high speed dash? Zoom your way around our barricades and smash your high score!

Controls:

  • Movement - can use keyboard or mouse
    • Keyboard - Arrow keys
      • Left & Right move ship left or right
      • Release keys to return to center
    • Mouse - Navigate the ship using the Position of your Pointer

Made using PixiJS
